name: One stitch at the time
description:
Suture as fast as you can cat's wounds to literally saved nine live with one accurate stitch.

Cliché: A stitch in times saves nine / cats have nine lives

Game inspired from the Trauma center series.
Made with Unity and Paint.net

Note: The latest windows build correspond to the browser one. I did switch platform and make the windows one after the submission but I didn't changed anything in it.

====

Credits:
- Cats assets where taken from Alicia's Atelier itch.io page : https://alicias-atelier.itch.io/fantasycatsrpg
- Sounds where made inside Chrome music lab: https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker/
- Some sound effects where downloaded from Kenney website: https://kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds
